title: COMPLYFirst Professional
creator: Odellus Corporation
description: COMPLYFirst is a comprehensive web accessibility testing desktop application (not server based). It provides Automated and Manual DOM interface accessibility testing against 508, WCAG2 and WAI ARIA. It provides reports to management and QA analysts and remediation code samples to developers.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
